50  RSBandPlannerROS::RSBandPlannerROS() : initialized_(false)

58 
59 
60  void RSBandPlannerROS::initialize(std::string name,
61  tf::TransformListener* tfListener, costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmapROS)
62  {
63  if (initialized_)
64  {
65  ROS_WARN("Planner already initialized. Should not be called more than "
66  "once");
67  return;
68  }
69 
70  // store tflistener and costmapROS
71  tfListener_ = tfListener;
72  costmapROS_ = costmapROS;
73 
74  ros::NodeHandle pnh("~/" + name);
75 
76  // initialize plan publishers
77  globalPlanPub_ = pnh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("global_plan", 1);
78  localPlanPub_ = pnh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("local_plan", 1);
79  ebandPlanPub_ = pnh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("eband_plan", 1);
80  rsPlanPub_ = pnh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("reeds_sheep_plan", 1);
81 
82  // create new eband planner
83  ebandPlanner_ = boost::shared_ptr<eband_local_planner::EBandPlanner>(
84  new eband_local_planner::EBandPlanner(name, costmapROS_));
85 
86  // create new reeds shepp planner
87  rsPlanner_ = boost::shared_ptr<ReedsSheppPlanner>(
88  new ReedsSheppPlanner(name, costmapROS_, tfListener_));
89  eband2RSStrategy_ = 0;
90 
91  // create new path tracking controller
92  ptc_ = boost::shared_ptr<CarLikeFuzzyPTC>(new CarLikeFuzzyPTC(name));
93 
94  // create and initialize dynamic reconfigure
95  drs_.reset(new drs(pnh));
96  drs::CallbackType cb =
97  boost::bind(&RSBandPlannerROS::reconfigureCallback, this, _1, _2);
98  drs_->setCallback(cb);
99 
100  // set initilized
101  initialized_ = true;
102 
103  ROS_DEBUG("Local Planner Plugin Initialized!");
104  }
105 
106  void RSBandPlannerROS::reconfigureCallback(RSBandPlannerConfig& config,
107  uint32_t level)
108  {
109  xyGoalTolerance_ = config.xy_goal_tolerance;
110  yawGoalTolerance_ = config.yaw_goal_tolerance;
111  eband2RSStrategy_ = config.eband_to_rs_strategy;
112  mergePlans_ = config.merge_plans;
113  emergencyPlanning_ = config.emergency_planning;
114 
115  if (rsPlanner_)
116  rsPlanner_->reconfigure(config);
117  else
118  ROS_ERROR("Reconfigure CB called before reeds shepp planner "
119  "initialization");
120 
121  if (ptc_)
122  ptc_->reconfigure(config);
123  else
124  ROS_ERROR("Reconfigure CB called before path tracking controller "
125  "initialization!");
126  }
127 
128 
129  bool RSBandPlannerROS::setPlan(
130  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& globalPlan)
131  {
132  if (!initialized_)
133  {
134  ROS_ERROR("Planner must be initialized before setPlan is called!");
135  return false;
136  }
137 
138  globalPlan_ = globalPlan;
139 
140  std::vector<int> planStartEndCounters(2, globalPlan_.size());
141 
142  if (!eband_local_planner::transformGlobalPlan(*tfListener_, globalPlan_,
143  *costmapROS_, costmapROS_->getGlobalFrameID(), transformedPlan_,
144  planStartEndCounters))
145  {
146  ROS_WARN("Could not transform global plan to the local frame");
147  return false;
148  }
149 
150  if (transformedPlan_.empty())
151  {
152  ROS_WARN("Transformed Plan is empty.");
153  return false;
154  }
155 
156 
157  if(!ebandPlanner_->setPlan(transformedPlan_))
158  {
159  costmapROS_->resetLayers();
160  if(!ebandPlanner_->setPlan(transformedPlan_))
161  {
162  ROS_ERROR("Setting plan to Elastic Band failed!");
163  return false;
164  }
165  }
166 
167  planStartEndCounters_ = planStartEndCounters;
168 
169  if (!ebandPlanner_->optimizeBand())
170  ROS_WARN("Optimization of eband failed!");
171 
172 
173  return true;
174  }
175 
176 
177  bool RSBandPlannerROS::computeVelocityCommands(geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd)
178  {
179  if (!initialized_)
180  {
181  ROS_ERROR("Planner must be initialized before computeVelocityCommands "
182  "is called!");
183  return false;
184  }
185 
186  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> ebandPlan, rsPlan, localPlan;
187 
188  if (isGoalReached())
189  {
190  cmd.linear.x = 0.0;
191  cmd.linear.y = 0.0;
192  cmd.angular.z = 0.0;
193  }
194  else
195  {
196  if (!updateEBand())
197  {
198  ROS_ERROR("Failed to update eband!");
199  return false;
200  }
201 
202  if (!ebandPlanner_->getPlan(ebandPlan)
203  || ebandPlan.empty())
204  {
205  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get eband planner plan!");
206  return false;
207  }
208 
209  // interpolate orientations of eband plan
210  interpolateOrientations(ebandPlan);
211 
212  // publish eband plan
213  base_local_planner::publishPlan(ebandPlan, ebandPlanPub_);
214 
215  // use reeds shepp planner to connect eband waypoints using RS paths
216  // select between the available eband to reeds shepp conversion strategies
217  int failIdx;
218  switch (eband2RSStrategy_)
219  {
220  case 0: // start to end planning strategy
221  failIdx = ebandPlan.size() * rsPlanner_->planPath(
222  ebandPlan.front(), ebandPlan.back(), rsPlan);
223  break;
224  case 1: // start to next waypoint planning strategy
225  {
226  int next = 1;
227  while (next < ebandPlan.size()-1)
228  {
229  double dist = hypot(
230  ebandPlan[0].pose.position.x - ebandPlan[next].pose.position.x,
231  ebandPlan[0].pose.position.y - ebandPlan[next].pose.position.y);
232  double dyaw = fabs(angles::shortest_angular_distance(
233  tf::getYaw(ebandPlan[0].pose.orientation),
234  tf::getYaw(ebandPlan[next].pose.orientation)));
235 
236  if (dist < xyGoalTolerance_ && dyaw < yawGoalTolerance_)
237  next++;
238  else
239  break;
240  }
241  failIdx = ebandPlan.size() * rsPlanner_->planPath(
242  ebandPlan.front(), *(ebandPlan.begin()+next), rsPlan);
243  break;
244  }
245  case 2: // point to point planning strategy until failure
246  failIdx = rsPlanner_->planPathUntilFailure(ebandPlan, rsPlan);
247  break;
248  case 3: // point to point planning strategy that skips failures
249  failIdx = rsPlanner_->planPathSkipFailures(ebandPlan, rsPlan);
250  break;
251  case 4: // receding end planning strategy
252  // plan path between start and end of eband and if it fails, decrement
253  // end of eband and try again, until a solution or start is reached
254  failIdx = rsPlanner_->planRecedingPath(ebandPlan, rsPlan);
255  break;
256  default: // invalid strategy
257  ROS_ERROR("Invalid eband_to_rs_strategy!");
258  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
259  }
260 
261  // calculate orientation error between robot and first eband target pose
262  double dyaw = fabs(angles::shortest_angular_distance(
263  tf::getYaw(ebandPlan[0].pose.orientation),
264  tf::getYaw(ebandPlan[1].pose.orientation)));
265 
266  // if reeds shepp planning failed or there is orientation error > π/4
267  // attempt emergency planning to reach target orientation (if enabled)
268  if (emergencyPlanning_ && (failIdx == 0 || dyaw > M_PI/3))
269  {
270  ROS_DEBUG("Failed to get reeds shepp plan. Attempting "
271  "emergency planning...");
272  if (emergencyPlanning_ && emergencyPlan(ebandPlan, rsPlan))
273  {
274  ROS_DEBUG("Emergency Planning succeeded!");
275  }
276  else
277  {
278  ROS_DEBUG("Emergency Planning failed!");
279  return false;
280  }
281  }
282  else if (!failIdx)
283  {
284  ROS_DEBUG("Failed to convert eband to rsband plan!");
285  return false;
286  }
287 
288  // set reeds shepp plan as local plan
289  localPlan = rsPlan;
290 
291  // merge rsPlan with the left out waypoints of eband to get rsband plan
292  if (mergePlans_)
293  {
294  for (unsigned int i = failIdx+1; i < ebandPlan.size(); i++)
295  {
296  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
297  tfListener_->transformPose(rsPlan.front().header.frame_id,
298  ebandPlan.front().header.stamp, ebandPlan[i],
299  ebandPlan[i].header.frame_id,
300  pose);
301  localPlan.push_back(pose);
302  }
303  }
304 
305  // publish global, local and rs plans
306  base_local_planner::publishPlan(globalPlan_, globalPlanPub_);
307  base_local_planner::publishPlan(localPlan, localPlanPub_);
308  base_local_planner::publishPlan(rsPlan, rsPlanPub_);
309 
310  // compute velocity command
311  if (!ptc_->computeVelocityCommands(localPlan, cmd))
312  {
313  ROS_ERROR("Path tracking controller failed to produce command");
314  return false;
315  }
316  }
317 
318  return true;
319  }
320 
321 
322  bool RSBandPlannerROS::isGoalReached()
323  {
324  if (!initialized_)
325  {
326  ROS_ERROR("Planner must be initialized before isGoalReached is called!");
327  return false;
328  }
329 
330  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robotPose;
331  if (!costmapROS_->getRobotPose(robotPose))
332  {
333  ROS_ERROR("Could not get robot pose!");
334  return false;
335  }
336 
337  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped goal = globalPlan_.back();
338 
339  double dist = base_local_planner::getGoalPositionDistance(
340  robotPose, goal.pose.position.x, goal.pose.position.y);
341  double yawDiff = base_local_planner::getGoalOrientationAngleDifference(
342  robotPose, tf::getYaw(goal.pose.orientation));
343 
344  if (dist < xyGoalTolerance_ && fabs(yawDiff) < yawGoalTolerance_)
345  {
346  ROS_INFO("Goal Reached!");
347  return true;
348  }
349 
350  return false;
351  }
352 
353 
354  bool RSBandPlannerROS::updateEBand()
355  {
356  if (!initialized_)
357  {
358  ROS_WARN("Planner must be initialized before updateEBand is called!");
359  return false;
360  }
361 
362  // get robot pose
363  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robotPose;
364  if (!costmapROS_->getRobotPose(robotPose))
365  {
366  ROS_ERROR("Could not get robot pose!");
367  return false;
368  }
369  // transform robot pose tf to msg
370  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped robotPoseMsg;
371  tf::poseStampedTFToMsg(robotPose, robotPoseMsg);
372 
373  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> tmpPlan(1, robotPoseMsg);
374 
375  // add robot pose to front of eband
376  if (!ebandPlanner_->addFrames(tmpPlan, eband_local_planner::add_front))
377  {
378  ROS_WARN("Could not connect current robot pose to existing eband!");
379  return false;
380  }
381 
382  // add new frames that have entered the local costmap window and remove the
383  // ones that have left it
384 
385  std::vector<int> planStartEndCounters = planStartEndCounters_;
386  if (!eband_local_planner::transformGlobalPlan(*tfListener_, globalPlan_,
387  *costmapROS_, costmapROS_->getGlobalFrameID(), transformedPlan_,
388  planStartEndCounters))
389  {
390  ROS_WARN("Failed to transform the global plan to the local frame!");
391  return false;
392  }
393 
394  if (transformedPlan_.empty())
395  {
396  ROS_WARN("Transformed plan is empty!");
397  return false;
398  }
399 
400  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> planToAppend;
401 
402  if (planStartEndCounters_[1] > planStartEndCounters[1])
403  {
404  if (planStartEndCounters_[1] > planStartEndCounters[0])
405  {
406  planToAppend = transformedPlan_;
407  }
408  else
409  {
410  int numOfDiscardedFrames =
411  planStartEndCounters[0] - planStartEndCounters_[1];
412  planToAppend.assign(transformedPlan_.begin() + numOfDiscardedFrames + 1,
413  transformedPlan_.end());
414  }
415 
416  if (ebandPlanner_->addFrames(planToAppend, eband_local_planner::add_back))
417  planStartEndCounters_ = planStartEndCounters;
418  else
419  {
420  ROS_WARN("Failed to add frames to existing band");
421  return false;
422  }
423  }
424 
425  if (!ebandPlanner_->optimizeBand())
426  {
427  ROS_WARN("Failed to optimize eband!");
428  return false;
429  }
430 
431  return true;
432  }
433 
434 
435  bool RSBandPlannerROS::emergencyPlan(
436  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& ebandPlan,
437  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& emergencyPlan)
438  {
439  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> tmpPlan(2, ebandPlan[0]);
440  tmpPlan.push_back(ebandPlan[1]);
441 
442  // interpolate orientation between robot position and target position
443  interpolateOrientations(tmpPlan);
444 
445  double dyaw = angles::shortest_angular_distance(
446  tf::getYaw(tmpPlan[0].pose.orientation),
447  tf::getYaw(tmpPlan[2].pose.orientation));
448 
449  // attempt to plan path, so as to remain in the same position, but
450  // attain the orientation of the first eband target pose
451  bool success = false;
452  for (int i = 1; i < 4; i++)
453  {
454  tmpPlan[1].pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(
455  tf::getYaw(tmpPlan[0].pose.orientation) + dyaw / 2 / i);
456 
457  if (rsPlanner_->planPath(tmpPlan[0], tmpPlan[1], emergencyPlan))
458  {
459  success = true;
460  break;
461  }
462  }
463 
464  return success;
465  }
466 
467 
468  void RSBandPlannerROS::interpolateOrientations(
469  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan)
470  {
471  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < plan.size() - 1; i++)
472  {
473  double dx, dy, yaw;
474  dx = plan[i+1].pose.position.x - plan[i].pose.position.x;
475  dy = plan[i+1].pose.position.y - plan[i].pose.position.y;
476  yaw = atan2(dy, dx);
477  plan[i].pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
478  plan[i].header.stamp = plan.front().header.stamp;
479  }
480  plan.back().header.stamp = plan.front().header.stamp;
481 
482  if ((!plan.back().pose.orientation.z && !plan.back().pose.orientation.w)
483  || tf::getYaw(plan.back().pose.orientation) == 0.0)
484  plan.back().pose.orientation = plan[plan.size()-2].pose.orientation;
485  }
